description.value: This value set provides an example of possible coded concepts representing medicinal products, packaged medicinal products, or medications based on their generic composition of active substance(s); active substance(s) with strength; active substance(s) with administrable dose form; active substance(s) with strength and administrable dose form.

display.value: Amoxicillin and clavulanic acid only product
Acetaminophen only product in rectal dose form
Amoxicillin and clavulanic acid only product in oral dose form
Lithium citrate only product in oral dose form
Acenocoumarol only product in oral dose form
Amoxicillin 875 mg and clavulanic acid (as clavulanate potassium) 125 mg oral tablet
Amoxicillin and Clavulanate Potassium 875 mg/1 125 mg/1 TABLET, FILM COATED
Amoxicillin and Clavulanate Potassium 875 mg/1 125 mg/1 20 TABLET, FILM COATED in 1 BOTTLE (50436-3129-1)
